channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 09:45 Driven anxiety in Kamyansky District. Watch for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 09:45 Driven anxiety in Kamyansky District. Watch for further messages.#Kamyan_ region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
